CHANGES

------------------

- Added display widget template for `ISelect2Widget`

------------------

- improve css styles


0.5.1 (2013-01-02)
------------------

- bugfix: fix linux chameleon template issues with line break in tag elements.


0.5.0 (2012-11-16)
------------------

- initial release
